thread.section_title: ONE UN New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Vacation
thread.title_full: Vacation - Review of ONE UN New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kelly W
title: Vacation
text: Thank you so much to the front desk staff for the upgrade . It was my kids first trip to NYC and the first room we booked was a complete dump. This hotel not only met our expectations, it exceeded them. I have stayed all over the city and this hotel absolutely has one of the the best views of the city !! Our room had panoramic views of the city on one side and the east river on the other . My only issue was the length of time for the valet to retrieve my vehicle .
